name: js13k-2025-firefly-cat
description: A magical firefly collection game for JS13K 2025

scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run compress && npm run zip
scripts.compress: npm run roadroller && npm run inline
scripts.zip: cd dist && zip ../js13k-2025.zip index.html && cd .. && ls -la js13k-2025.zip && echo 'Zip size:' && wc -c js13k-2025.zip
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run size
